items.name: InSpec
items.desc: InSpec is a free and open-source Chef framework for testing and auditing applications and infrastructure. InSpec is designed to integrate very easily into existing DevOps pipelines. MITRE has partnered with the open-source community to create a growing number of baseline testing profiles to make it easy for developers to jump right in.

values.name: InSpec Profile Resources Reference
values.desc: List of the existing systems InSpec can play with straight out of the box (InSpec "resources")

values.name: InSpec Profile Developers Course
values.desc: The basics on how to write and run tests

values.name: InSpec Tools and Utilization
values.desc: Guide to installation of InSpec Tools.
